title: Slysoft AnyDVD 6.4.5.0 (Noob Edition) (Bug Fix!!!)
description:
Here is a bug Fix....i found that the "kill Update.reg" file that disables the program from checking for updates and also blacklisting your key that i made works, if you follow the instructions but, i just tried it on a laptop with a Vista Ultimate 32 bit install and it Does not work

...in fact it causes some problems, so obviously there is a difference in the registry keys used depending on your OS.

There and now 2 .reg files...One for XP and the other for Vista...let me know if they do not work on other versions of windows.
